title: Frame by frame: the art of animation
creator_contributor_role: Paul Burnford Film Productions, production company
subject_group: Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Animation (Cinematography)
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Motion pictures - Production and direction
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Time lapse cinematography
Advertising, Film, Journalism, Mass Media & TV/Cinematography - Special effects
description: This film explores the possibilities of making a frame-by-frame, or animated film. Illustrates a variety of frame-by-frame techniques: still-picture filming (kinestasis), flicker-framing, cut-out animation, people animation (pixillation), direct images on film, and time sequence filming. This film is suitable for upper secondary levels.
